name: DontLookBack
description:
Do not Look Back is a 2D platform style game whose main arguments are time management, acceptance of unforeseen events and maturing.
The game will accompany the character Ellie in her attempt to save a loved one from a cruel fate using the power to return to a specific point in time. She should arrive at her destinations at the right time running through the city, climbing through towers and buildings, overcoming obstacles and puzzles, and returning in time when she does not reach the goal or shift the focus of her investigation.

Instructions

Use AWSD to move and P to select and interact with objects. You also can use Q to use your power and restart the level and T to pause your game. And the Enter to pass the scenes.
